translation.zh: （布鲁诺 星期四 早餐 晚餐 星期五 星期一）

translation.en: ♪ You say thoughts that connect to my mind ♪
♪ We get lost with reflecting your touch ♪ ♪ You're my best friend ♪
You have a nice dog as well.

translation.zh: 小伙儿真乖 布鲁诺

translation.en: Bruno, down. All the way down. No, down.
translation.zh: 布鲁诺 趴下 趴到地上
祝你今天愉快 先生

translation.en: You've gotta go down when I tell you go down, buddy.
translation.zh: 我叫你趴下的时候 你得趴下 伙计

translation.en: Look at the puppy. You see it?
translation.zh: 看那条狗狗 看见了吗？

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey! Don't touch my dog.
What's wrong with you? I'm just petting your dog.
translation.zh: 你有什么毛病？ 我只是摸摸你的狗而已

translation.en: I don't like you petting my dog either, and this is a human being as well.
translation.zh: 我也不喜欢你摸我的狗 它也是人

translation.en: Stop with the Charlie shit. His name's Bruno. It's Bruno.
translation.zh: 别叫它“查理” 好吗？ 它的名字叫布鲁诺 它叫布鲁诺

translation.en: His name's Charlie like his daddy named after me.
translation.zh: 它叫查理 跟它老爸一样 以我的名字命名的

translation.en: I'm his daddy, and his name is Bruno.
translation.zh: 我是它老爸 它叫布鲁诺

translation.en: Everybody on the block knows his name is Charlie. I named him.
translation.zh: 这一带的所有人都知道它叫“查理” 是我给它取名的

translation.en: He even looks like a Charlie.
Stop calling my fucking dog Charlie, all right?
translation.zh: 别他妈叫我的狗“查理”了 好吗？
它叫布鲁诺 懂吗？ 它叫布鲁诺

translation.en: All right. I'll see you later, Charlie.
translation.zh: 好 回头见 查理
星期五 今天星期几？五块

translation.en: You almost hit Bruno with that thing.
translation.zh: 你那破玩意差点撞到布鲁诺

translation.en: Well, Malcolm, maybe Bruno shouldn't take up so much space on the goddamn sidewalk.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆 或许布鲁诺 不该在人行道上占他妈这么大的空间

translation.en: I got a business to run here.
A business? You call this a business?
You're selling stolen shit out of a stolen shopping cart.
translation.zh: 你用偷来的购物车贩卖偷来的东西

translation.en: I have you know Carl's cart is a certified vendor
translation.zh: 你要知道 卡尔手推车是执照经营的商贩

translation.en: Oh, okay. Let's see the permit.
translation.zh: 好 给我看看许可证

translation.en: I don't feel like going through the paperwork right now.
There's no city that's giving Crackhead Carl a permit to sell stolen shit.
translation.zh: 没有任何城市会给可卡因瘾君子凯尔 许可证 来销售偷来的东西

translation.en: I would prefer you just call me Carl.
The shit that I smoke does not need to be put in front of my name.
translation.zh: 我磕什么玩意 没必要放在我的名字前面

translation.en: What if I called your dog ball-licking Bruno?
translation.zh: 我叫你的狗“舔蛋蛋布鲁诺”怎么样？

translation.en: Now, is there anything that you like?
Because today is five dollar Friday.

translation.zh: 每样东西都会便宜五块

translation.en: Five dollars off a steak. Five dollars off a plunger.
translation.zh: 便宜五块的牛排 便宜五块的皮老虎

translation.en: -Five dollars off a laptop. -I'd like... for you to get Carl's cart
translation.zh: -便宜五块的笔记本电脑 -我想… 看见布鲁诺时 你要把卡尔手推车推离人行道

translation.en: off the fucking sidewalk when you see Bruno.
translation.zh: 看见布鲁诺时 你要把卡尔手推车推离人行道

translation.en: ♪ Passing up on all these ♪ ♪ Gifts ♪
Don't ask me shit you don't want the answer to.
translation.zh: 别问我你不想知道答案的破问题

translation.en: Yeah, nice to see you, too.
translation.zh: 嗯 我也很高兴见到你

translation.en: No one bought that fancy stuff but you, so it wasn't worth having.
translation.zh: 除了你 没人买这么贵的玩意 所有不值得进货
什么意思？那是布鲁诺的食物

translation.en: I bought enough to pay the light bill here.
translation.zh: 我买了那么多 足够付这里的电费了
我买了那么多 足够付这里的电费了 你才没有

translation.en: Go to the supermarket like everyone else.
translation.zh: 跟其他人一样 去超市吧

translation.en: You know they don't let dogs in there.
This is not Bruno's spot. This is my spot.
translation.zh: 这不是布鲁诺的地盘 这是我的地盘

translation.en: You want a small bag of chips?
A Snapple? A loosie? A Phillies? Some lotto numbers?
translation.zh: 思乐宝？烟？菲利斯雪茄？彩票？

translation.en: You come here to my bodega.
fresh produce, broccoli, whatever the hell you eat?
translation.zh: 新鲜农产品 西兰花 你吃什么玩意？

translation.en: We're not a supermarket! What the fuck?
Come on. You know the rules.
translation.zh: 拜托 你知道规定的

translation.en: -No dogs allowed. -Come on. Let my dog in your supermarket.
translation.zh: -狗不准进超市 -别这样 让我的狗进超市吧

translation.en: You know my dog. He's not gonna do anything.
translation.zh: 你了解我的狗 它不会怎么样的

translation.en: Okay, so if you tell it to sit and stay, it'll listen?
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你叫它坐下别动 它会听话？
对啊！ 布鲁诺 坐下

translation.en: Good, then he could sit and stay his ass out there.
translation.zh: 很好 那它可以坐在外面 乖乖别动

translation.en: All right, Bruno. Come on. I want you to stay here. Okay, buddy?
translation.zh: 好 布鲁诺 来吧 你待在这里 好吗 伙计？

translation.en: I want you to stay here. All right?
You're gonna be a good boy.
I'll be right back. Stay, okay? I love you.
translation.zh: 我马上回来 别动 好吗？我爱你

translation.en: I guess we like the same kind of meat. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们大概喜欢同一种肉

translation.en: This ain't your bedroom, you know? We're in the supermarket. Come on.
translation.zh: 这不是你的卧室 知道吗？ 我们在超市 快点

translation.en: Hey! You son of a bitch!
Hey! What are you doing? You stealing my dog?
What are you talking about? This is my dog.
translation.zh: 这是你的狗 你说什么？这是我的狗

translation.en: Are you nuts? You just took him from me. It's my dog.
translation.zh: 你疯了？你刚刚抢了我的狗 它是我的狗

translation.en: What are you doing, kid? What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你干嘛 小鬼？你干嘛呢？
谁把你养大的？ 我把他养大的
如果有音乐 他就会跳舞
不 一点问题都没有
来吧 布鲁诺 我们走
好吧 小子 展示你的舞技

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. That's what I like.
-[man 2] What up, little Charlie? -Everybody on the block
translation.zh: 你好吗 小查理？ 这一带的所有人都知道它叫“查理”
这一带的所有人都知道它叫“查理”

translation.en: [man 2] Learn your fucking dog's name, man. What the fuck you doing?
translation.zh: -搞清楚你他妈的狗叫什么名字 老兄 -你他妈的在干什么？

translation.en: You've got to go down when I tell you go down, please.
translation.zh: 我叫你趴下的时候 你得趴下 拜托

translation.en: [Malcolm] You wanna change my dog's name, huh?
You wanna mess with my life?
You have a nice day now.
